name: Cross Country
overview: One day in prison a clown was waiting for the best moment... HIs name was Clowny and his goal was to escape, kidnap the princess and begin his rein of terror over the land. He even cut the tail off the fox, making in you a mortal enemy. Guide the fox in halting Clowny's escapade and save the princess. But you'll need to get past his minions first.
